title: Keep Pets Warm Indoors
summary: Provide warm bedding and keep your pets away from cold drafts.
details: Use cozy blankets or pet-safe heated beds, especially for older or short-haired pets. Avoid leaving pets in cold garages .

title: Protect Their Paws
summary: Clean paws after outdoor walks to remove ice and salt.
details: Snow, ice, and road salt can damage paw pads. Use a damp towel to clean paws and apply paw balm to prevent dryness or cracks.

title: Keep Fresh Water Available
summary: Check your pet’s water bowl frequently to ensure it’s not frozen.
details: Pets may drink less if the water is too cold or frozen. Use a heated water bowl or refresh water regularly to keep them hydrated.
